# attributeValues

**Instance Property**

The values of each attribute associated with the node’s attached shader.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue] { get set }
```

```swift
var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue] { get set }
```

## Discussion

All nodes have their own copy of an attribute value and therefore the attribute values can be different per-node across the same [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKShader]. If instead you need all nodes to share the same value, use [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKUniform]. Uniforms can change values every frame, but uniforms cannot vary per-node like attributes can.

## Applying a Shader with an Effect Node

- **shader**: A custom shader that is called when the effect node is blended into the parent’s framebuffer.
- **setValue(_:forAttribute:)**: Sets an attribute value for an attached shader.
- **value(forAttributeNamed:)**: Gets the value of a shader attribute.
